title: How do i reform
body:
Just got 2 accs permad today, think im on like 61 or someshitafter iu start playing in s7
I just can't help it, everyonesbad, don't understand how ppl been playing for years and can'tgrasp the game

replies.body: I like winning tho, so brb with a new acc soon

Just to get that one banned too.
There's no winning when you're unable to keep a stable account.
I mean... i still win alot xd

Wins means nothing without a stable account. 

Period.
Means i win and others lose, xd

Actually, they win and you lose.
They keep their account. You don't. Because you're not capable of it.
? But i win ingame, and they derank? xdd

Assuming this is not a troll post, you uninstall and go find a good therapist. This is obviously not a healthy game for you.

61 accounts is not a matter of reform, it is a matter of finding help before you attempt to stab someone or yourself with your keyboard.

HAHGAHAHAA, but naw, im just competitive, i soft flame, not gonna stab someone bro
In game toxicity =/= anything with real life
2 diff things
bind the enter key to something else and intentionally forget what you bound the chat to

you stand no chance. if you just look at their champ wrong you will hurt their feelings and get ban. i agree people are really bad at this game, and it sucks they dont understand even the most basic concept of the game (at least in low elo)
whats low elo, cus ppl do this in diamond too
